title: .setUTCMonth()
description: The `.setUTCMonth()` JS method sets the month for a specified date according to UTC, as a number between 0 (January) and 11 (December).
content: The method that sets the month for a specified date according to UTC (Universal Coordinated Time). The value must be between 0, representing January and 11, representing December and it adjusts the day to account for different month lengths.
